channel.title: Range problem. and follow attack! plz help
channel.description:
hi! ive been codin on the same server for about 2 months and leard all the basic and how to locate a problem etc. now i have got about 5 ppl to test my server. the to following problems are :
1st: Ranged
the ranged it self is working it fires arrows but id dont fire at distant, i need to be upclose like on melee plz help.
2nd: Attack follow
when i attack an player in wildernees, and the other person start walking/running i just follow and dont keep attacking. why??
pleas help me.
Crom170 --Rune4u--[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 11, 2009, 02:05:38 pm[/size][hr]And if someone knoe about how to make an afk command. to make the player reapet AFK? thx[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 11, 2009, 02:27:39 pm[/size][hr]anyone?
